name: status
description: Monitor and query the status of all operations (active, completed, failed) without blocking execution

hints.primary: Real-time operation monitoring tool for tracking concurrent processes
hints.usage: status (shows all operations), status --operation_id op_123 (specific operation), status --tools cargo,npm (filter by tool prefix)
hints.wait_hint: Status checks are instantaneous - use while other operations run in the background
hints.default: Perfect tool for monitoring progress while working on other tasks

operation_id.description: Specific operation ID to query (optional; shows all if omitted)

tools.description: Comma-separated tool name prefixes to filter by (optional; shows all if omitted)

subcommand.name: run
subcommand.description: Query the status of operations without blocking. Shows active and completed operations with efficiency analysis including concurrency metrics and wait time analysis.

options.name: operation_id
options.description: Specific operation ID to query (optional; shows all if omitted)

options.name: tools
options.description: Comma-separated tool name prefixes to filter by (optional; shows all if omitted)
